Actions.Name: Stutter
Actions.Effects: The [name] or an adjacent ally teleports 1.

Actions.Name: Soul Rip
Actions.Effects: All foes in the area must sacrifice 4 after this ability resolves.

Actions.Name: Horrid Slashing
Actions.Effects: The [name] teleports 1, then teleports 1. Each time, it deals 2 damage to an adjacent foe. Bloodied foes are dazed.

Actions.Name: Shriek
Actions.Description: All foes in range must save or be forced to flee, shoving them 2 spaces in a direction of the [name]'s choice, or 1 space on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Soul Drain
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe sacrifices 25% of their maximum hp. The [name] or an ally in range 3 is cured.
